description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref. 3348/APP/2023/138, dated 02-06-2023, (Erection of a two-storey academic building (Use Class F1), demolition of existing temporary modular structures and partial demolition of existing main teaching building to facilitate connections to the main school, redevelopment of external hard and soft landscaped areas and associated works) to amend Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) in order to make alterations to the design and to amend the trigger point of Condition 14 (Energy).
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning consent reference 3348/APP/2023/138, dated 02/06/2023, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
TVC0025-NOV-V2-00-DR-A-PL08 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-00-DR-A-PL01 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-01-DR-A-PL02 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-02-DR-A-PL03 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL04 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL05 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL06 Rev. P01;
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL07 Rev. P01;
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
REASON
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan: Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).
Condition 14 (Energy Monitoring, Recording and Reporting Plan) of planning consent reference  3348/APP/2023/138, dated 02/06/2023, is amended to:

Prior to first occupation of the development, a detailed energy monitoring, recording and reporting plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The plan shall accord with the requirements of the London Plan (policy SI2) and the GLA Energy Assessment Guidance (April 2020 or as amended) and demonstrate that the development will secure the 98% saving in CO2 emissions from the regulated energy load in accordance with the energy strategy (Energy Strategy Version 01 Dated 11th January 2023).

The development must proceed in accordance with the approved reporting structure and where there is a failure to achieve the carbon savings as set out in the energy strategy, the quantum (tCO2) shall be treated as part of the shortfall and shall result in a cash in lieu contribution in accordance with the formula set ou

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 2 and 14, which are superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 3348/APP/2023/138, dated 02/06/2023, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been superseded:
4267 CDC XX GF DR A (GA) 001 Rev. F Proposed Site Plan
4267 CDC XX GF DR A (GA) 102 Rev. A Proposed Ground Floor Plan
4267 CDC XX GF DR A (GA) 112 Rev. A Proposed First Floor Plan
4267 CDC XX GF DR A (GA) 123 Rev. A Proposed Roof Plan
4267 CDC XX XX DR A (GA) 410 Rev. A Proposed Elevations 1 of 2
4267 CDC XX XX DR A (GA) 420 Rev. A Proposed Elevations 2 of 2
4267 CDC XX XX DR A (GA) 300 Rev. C Proposed Sections 1 of 2
4267 CDC XX XX DR A (GA) 305 Proposed Sections 2 of 2
The following plans have been approved:
TVC0025-NOV-V2-00-DR-A-PL08 Rev. P01 Proposed Site Plan
TVC0025-NOV-V1-00-DR-A-PL01 Rev. P01 Proposed Ground Floor Plan
TVC0025-NOV-V1-01-DR-A-PL02 Rev. P01 Proposed First Floor Plan
TVC0025-NOV-V1-02-DR-A-PL03 Rev. P01 Proposed Roof Plan
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL04 Rev. P01 Proposed Elevations 1 of 2
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL05 Rev. P01 Proposed Elevations 2 of 2
TVC0025-NOV-V1-XX-DR-A-PL06 Rev. P01 Proposed Sections 1 of 2
TVC0025-N
